nodes.bodyText: Could we call the action pushSchema instead of uploadSchema? Though we call it uploadSchema in our API, in our public documentation and existing CLI, this is called "publishing to the registry," "pushing to the registry" and service:push, and I want to make sure we're telling a consistent message to users since the upload will actually correspond the uploaded schema as active on the graph@variant in question.
